chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, alarm clock extraordinaire, croaked nightly: "Chirp! 10 PM! Medicine time!" One evening, Pip, the chick 🐥, was engrossed in building a tiny tower of twigs. 🧱 Completely forgot. Suddenly, a soggy, green face popped up. "CROAK!💊 Sleepytime juice, Pip! Or face the consequences…extra loud bedtime stories!" Pip gulped it down, giggling. Ferdinand winked. 😉 "Much better. Now, about the tale of the firefly who couldn't glow..."😴
